high_descs: turn around, walk towards bed, turn right, walk to the desk
pick up the book that is on the desk
hold the book up to the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a book with the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and veer left to the table to the right of the bed.
Pick up the blue book on the table.
Look at the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a book by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: turn around and go to the desk on the right
pick up the book on the desk
lift up the book you picked up from the desk
anns.task_desc: pick up the book and turn on the light
